attributes.value: Finds blind honesty foolish
Values tradition
Values independence
Sees competition as wasteful and silly
Finds nature somewhat disturbing
Is dour as a rule
Never becomes angry
Is confident under pressure
Is brave in the face of imminent danger
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Accepts favors without developing a sense of obligation, preferring to act as the current situation demands
Generally acts impartially and is rarely moved to mercy
Generally acts with a narrow focus on the current activity
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Is never moved by the emotions of others
Never acts without prolonged deliberation, even to her own detriment and the harm of those around her
Seeks out exciting and adventurous situations
Has a tendency to consider ideas and abstractions over practical applications
Unfathomably weak
Slow to tire
Quick to heal
The ability to focus
Willpower
An unbelievably atrocious sense of the position of her own body
